mapper.select: select * from member order by mem_idx
select * from member where mem_idx = #{ mem_idx }
select * from member where mem_id = #{ mem_id }
mapper.insert: insert into member(mem_name, mem_id, mem_pwd, mem_email, mem_phone, mem_zipcode, mem_addr, mem_ip, policy_a, policy_b) values(#{ mem_name }, #{ mem_id }, #{ mem_pwd }, #{ mem_email }, #{ mem_phone }, #{ mem_zipcode }, #{ mem_addr }, #{ mem_ip }, #{ policy_a }, #{ policy_b })
